  14. (**************************************************************************)

  16. (** Option values.

  18.     Option values explicitly indicate the presence or absence of a value.

  20.     @since 4.08 *)

  22. (** {1:options Options} *)

  24. ‌type 'a t = 'a option = None | Some of 'a (**)
  25. (** The type for option values. Either [None] or a value [Some v]. *)

  27. ‌val none : 'a option
  28. (** [none] is [None]. *)

  30. ‌val some : 'a -> 'a option
  31. (** [some v] is [Some v]. *)

  33. val value : 'a option -> default:'a -> 'a
  34. (** [value o ~default] is [v] if [o] is [Some v] and [default] otherwise. *)

  36. ‌val get : 'a option -> 'a
  37. (** [get o] is [v] if [o] is [Some v] and raise otherwise.

  39.     @raise Invalid_argument if [o] is [None]. *)

  41. ‌val bind : 'a option -> ('a -> 'b option) -> 'b option
  42. (** [bind o f] is [f v] if [o] is [Some v] and [None] if [o] is [None]. *)

  44. ‌val join : 'a option option -> 'a option
  45. (** [join oo] is [Some v] if [oo] is [Some (Some v)] and [None] otherwise. *)

  47. ‌val map : ('a -> 'b) -> 'a option -> 'b option
  48. (** [map f o] is [None] if [o] is [None] and [Some (f v)] if [o] is [Some v]. *)

  50. ‌val fold : none:'a -> some:('b -> 'a) -> 'b option -> 'a
  51. (** [fold ~none ~some o] is [none] if [o] is [None] and [some v] if [o] is
  52.     [Some v]. *)

  54. ‌val iter : ('a -> unit) -> 'a option -> unit
  55. (** [iter f o] is [f v] if [o] is [Some v] and [()] otherwise. *)

  57. (** {1:preds Predicates and comparisons} *)

  59. ‌val is_none : 'a option -> bool
  60. (** [is_none o] is [true] if and only if [o] is [None]. *)

  62. ‌val is_some : 'a option -> bool
  63. (** [is_some o] is [true] if and only if [o] is [Some o]. *)

  65. ‌val equal : ('a -> 'a -> bool) -> 'a option -> 'a option -> bool
  66. (** [equal eq o0 o1] is [true] if and only if [o0] and [o1] are both [None]
  67.     or if they are [Some v0] and [Some v1] and [eq v0 v1] is [true]. *)

  69. ‌val compare : ('a -> 'a -> int) -> 'a option -> 'a option -> int
  70. (** [compare cmp o0 o1] is a total order on options using [cmp] to compare
  71.     values wrapped by [Some _]. [None] is smaller than [Some _] values. *)

  73. (** {1:convert Converting} *)

  75. ‌val to_result : none:'e -> 'a option -> ('a, 'e) result
  76. (** [to_result ~none o] is [Ok v] if [o] is [Some v] and [Error none]
  77.     otherwise. *)

  79. ‌val to_list : 'a option -> 'a list
  80. (** [to_list o] is [[]] if [o] is [None] and [[v]] if [o] is [Some v]. *)

  82. ‌val to_seq : 'a option -> 'a Seq.t
  83. (** [to_seq o] is [o] as a sequence. [None] is the empty sequence and
  84.     [Some v] is the singleton sequence containing [v]. *)
